articles.title: ChatGPT introduces shopping capabilities to enhance user experience
articles.author: The News International
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new update to ChatGPT. This update integrates shopping features into ChatGPT, allowing users to receive tailored product suggestions and facilitating faster product finding, comparison, and purchase.

articles.title: If You Get Slightly Obsessive When Cleaning, These 32 Products Will Give You Thorough, Immediate Results
articles.author: Natalie Brown
articles.summary: The content highlights various new or updated cleaning products and tools available on Amazon, ranging from pressure washers and degreasers to specialized items like fur de-matting brushes and vinyl record cleaning kits. These products aim to solve specific cleaning challenges and improve household cleaning efficiency, backed by promising user reviews.

articles.title: Lux Cozy eyes 800 crore revenue from Pynk in 5 yrs
articles.author: Udit Prasanna Mukherji
articles.summary: Lux Cozy is formally launching its women's wear brand, Pynk, nationally on May 1st. The company is targeting Rs 125-130 crore revenue in the first 12 months and aims to reach Rs 750-800 crore by 2029-30, supported by an Rs 23-25 crore promotional spend. Shraddha Kapoor has been signed as Pynk's brand ambassador.

articles.title: Meta AI is here to take on ChatGPT and give your Ray-Ban Meta Smart Glasses ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Meta AI launched a standalone mobile app. This app controls Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses.

articles.title: JD Drops New Balance 1000 Collection Featuring Exclusive Cyber-Jade Colourway
articles.author: Steve Slocombe
articles.summary: JD and New Balance are releasing a new collaboration. The collaboration features a 'street-ready pack' of the NB 1000 silhouette with four new colorways.

articles.title: Marketers are ‘freaking out' about AI search. This Seattle startup just raised $2M to help.
articles.author: Taylor Soper
articles.summary: Gumshoe, a Seattle startup, has launched a service to help marketers understand how AI search tools recommend products. Their technology generates conversations with AI models to reveal how brands are discussed and what sources are cited, providing insights into a company's 'share of LLM'. Gumshoe is currently in public beta with hundreds of companies and plans to implement a commercial paywall model this summer.

articles.title: Katalon Officially Launches TrueTest™ – The First AI-Native Testing System That Thinks Like a Tester and Learns from Users
articles.summary: Katalon Inc. has launched TrueTest™, an AI-native automated testing system designed to learn from real users and create/maintain relevant test coverage. TrueTest eliminates reliance on pre-scripted models by observing customer behavior and auto-generating test cases, which are automatically updated as applications evolve. The new product is aimed to reduce repetitive tasks and test script updates for QA teams.

articles.title: Living Well: 12 New Lifestyle Finds From April You'll Want To Use Every Day
articles.author: Victoria Uwumarogie
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works introduced Sweetest Song Fine Fragrance Mist, Le Creuset launched Flamme Dorée Collection to mark 100 years, and Cabeau released Evolution X Neck Pillow. Google has launched a new affordable smartphone named Pixel 9a at $499 and Beats dropped its best-selling Pill speaker in two vibrant new colors.

articles.title: Get ready to shop on ChatGPT: Here's how to do it like a pro
articles.author: TOI Trending Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching a new shopping feature within ChatGPT. This feature enables users to search for and purchase products through ChatGPT, leveraging AI to analyze preferences and product reviews.  Users can provide specific prompts, and ChatGPT will generate product recommendations, directing them to the seller's website for purchase.

articles.title: Voters head to polls on last day of early voting for San Antonio's May election
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers streaming services on mobile phones. Users can access this service through the KENS 5 app.

articles.title: Jolly Cannabis Returns to Champs Atlantic City 2025
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: JOLLY is launching new products with fresh packaging and next-level innovation at Champs Atlantic City 2025. They are introducing JOLLY 1:1 two packs.

articles.title: You Can Finally Talk With Meta AI Outside of Facebook and WhatsApp
articles.author: Vinayak Guhanarayan
articles.summary: Meta launched Meta AI, a standalone app powered by Llama 4, designed to provide conversational and personalized responses. Ray-Ban Meta Glasses are also receiving an upgrade with deeper integrations, enhancing their vision and analytical capabilities as part of the standalone app rollout. Meta AI is initially available in the US and Canada with plans to expand.

articles.title: Walmart Is Selling a $407 Pressure Washer for Just $90 That 'Works Wonders' on Fences and Driveways
articles.author: John Alexander
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Sugift Electric Pressure Washer at a discounted price of $90. This pressure washer features two inputs (outlet and water supply), a detergent bank, and four nozzles for controlling water blasts, capable of reaching 3300 PSI. Its compact design, handle, and wheels allow easy transportation for cleaning sidewalks, siding, and decks.

articles.title: Very nice! Robots turn heads at Canton Fair
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: The Canton Fair in Guangzhou features 30,000+ exporters and spotlights advanced manufacturing, including a new service robot zone. This zone showcases China's latest AI technology, such as coffee robots, pet bots, and industrial exoskeletons.

articles.title: Starbucks' Unicorn Frapuccino Has Some New Competition
articles.author: Rachel Dillin
articles.summary: Sonic Drive-In has launched a new limited-time beverage called the Unicorn Dreams Slush, a pink drink with flavor-filled bubbles, whipped cream, and sugar crystals. The drink is available nationwide starting May 5, with early access through the Sonic app, and comes with a collectible color-changing Unicorn Horn Straw.

articles.title: Next's £22 sun dress with a 'casual style for hot summer days'
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Next is offering a new black jersey midi summer dress made from a comfortable cotton-blend jersey fabric. The dress features a square neckline, thick straps, whipstitch detailing and is available in sizes 6 to 26, and also in khaki green. Shoppers describe the dress as easy to wear and comfortable.

articles.title: Why We Are Selling itel A90 For Less Than N100,000 ' Firm
articles.author: Daily Independent
articles.summary: LAGOSitel has launched the A90 phone in Nigeria, a budget-friendly smartphone priced under N105,000. The A90 features an Octa-Core T7100 processor and aims to offer robust durability and impressive performance for the entry-level segment.

articles.title: Tracy Beckerman: A Shampoo by Any Other Name
articles.author: Tracy Beckerman
articles.summary: The mother in the story purchased a 'new shampoo' after visiting the hair salon and has tried out the "Freaken" hair product line, which includes shampoo, conditioner, hair gel, and hairspray. While she dislikes the hairspray smell and finds the conditioner too heavy, she likes the hair gel from this line.

articles.title: Starbucks' new drive-thru in Texas is the coffee giant's first 3D printed store in the US
articles.author: JAMIE STENGLE
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced its first 3D printed store in the U.S. marking a new format for its retail locations.

articles.title: Meet itel A90: The only colorful & durable smartphone you can get for under N100k
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: itel has launched the itel A90 smartphone, featuring IP54 dust and water resistance, up to 256GB storage, and a 5000mAh battery with 15W fast charging. The itel A90 is available at itel Home Stores nationwide for 89,900 Naira (64+3 GB) and 99,900 Naira (128+4 GB), with MTN users receiving a 50% data bonus for six months upon purchase.

articles.title: Walmart shoppers are rushing to get $400 slashed off THLAND nugget ice maker price
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the THLAND Nugget Ice Maker at a discounted price of $399. This ice maker produces up to 41 pounds of soft, chewable nugget ice daily and features a built-in water tank, eliminating the need for a water hookup and automatic cleaning cycle.

articles.title: ChatGPT Gains New Shopping Features With Visual Search and More
articles.author: Tim Hardwick
articles.summary: OpenAI updated ChatGPT with visual search results, personalized recommendations, and improved product filtering, creating a discovery and comparison engine. Users can now browse and compare products from across the web within the ChatGPT interface. The update returns cleaner, scrollable product cards complete with images, star ratings, pricing, and summaries pulled from user reviews.

articles.title: I Swapped My $230 Le Labo Santal 33 Perfume for These 8 Dupes
articles.author: Beth Gillette
articles.summary: Le Labo Santal 33 is a popular unisex perfume known for its unique scent and high price. Due to its popularity, several alternative fragrances, called 'dupes,' have emerged, offering a similar scent profile to Santal 33.

articles.title: From Kylie Jenner to Beyoncé: Shop celebrity skincare faves on sale at Amazon
articles.author: Trisha Easto
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting a Summer Beauty Event, offering up to 30% off on selected skincare products. The event, a two-week sale on beauty products, started on April 28 and will continue until May 11, featuring discounts of up to 35% on various products like makeup, skincare, fragrances, and hair care.

articles.title: From Kylie Jenner to Beyoncé: Shop celebrity skincare faves on sale at Amazon
articles.author: Trisha Easto
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting its Summer Beauty Event, a two-week sale offering discounts up to 35% on beauty products like makeup, skincare, fragrances, and hair care. Featured deals include discounts on the Medicube Age-R Booster Pro and a best-selling vitamin C serum.

articles.title: From Kylie Jenner to Beyoncé: Shop celebrity skincare faves on sale at Amazon
articles.author: Trisha Easto
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting its Summer Beauty Event, a two-week sale where customers can save up to 35% on makeup, skincare, fragrances, hair care and more. As part of the event, customers can find discounts on skincare products, including Medicube Age-R Booster Pro, the best-selling vitamin C serum, and other beauty products.

articles.title: Samsung opens registration for Vision AI QLED and OLED television in India: Here's how you can register and avail the offers
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has started registrations for its Vision AI television range in India, including Neo QLED, OLED, and QLED models. The Vision AI series offers on-device AI capabilities that adapt to surroundings and enhance the viewing experience. The 2025 OLED TV lineup featuring three next-gen series (S95F, S90F, and S85F) in screen class sizes up to 83' are expected to launch next month.

articles.title: Nomad Internet Launches the FWA Exchange Store, Helping Entrepreneurs to Build Their Wireless Empire
articles.summary: Nomad Internet launched the FWA Exchange Store, a new platform for buying, activating, and managing wireless services. The platform offers unlimited 5G plans from Verizon and T-Mobile, allowing users to bring their own modems. A special launch offer includes the Verizon Dragon Modem for $99.

articles.title: BeiersdorfOfficially LaunchesEucerininNigeria
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Beiersdorf, the maker of NIVEA, has launched Eucerin in Nigeria. This launch reinforces the company's commitment to science-backed skincare solutions.

articles.title: Review: HOT has a new streamer – how does it improve the TV viewing experience?
articles.summary: HOT has introduced the HOT Streamer V5, a new dedicated streamer based on Android TV and customized for HOT's ecosystem. The HOT Streamer V5 features AI-SR technology to improve picture quality and supports 4K resolution content, HDR 10 Plus, and Dolby Vision. The HOT Streamer V5 includes a remote control with fast access to HOT content sections and a dedicated button for Netflix.

articles.title: itel A90: The only colorful, durable smartphone you can get for under N100,000
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: itel launched the itel A90 smartphone, emphasizing its affordability, durability, stylish design, and smart features. The itel A90 is positioned as a reliable device accessible for under N100,000.

articles.title: Spring, simplified: How 8 smart gadgets can help your family work less, enjoy more
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: Anker Innovations, along with its sub-brands Eufy and Nebula, has introduced several new products designed to enhance everyday life. Eufy launched E25 Robot Vacuum and Mopping system under pre-sale for a June launch at eufy.com. Nebula launched X1 4K Projector featuring a built-in micro gimbal and optical zoom, making outdoor movie nights easier. Furthermore, Anker is releasing the SOLIX F3800 Plus Portable Power Station for home power backup and the Thunderbolt™ 5 Docking Station for home office upgrades, available April 24.

articles.title: Get a taste of New York with this new Allentown bagel shop
articles.author: Graysen Golter
articles.summary: Manhattan Bagel, a national bagel chain, has introduced its services to Allentown with the opening of a new location.

articles.title: Meet the itel A90: The Only Colorful & Durable Smartphone You Can Get for Under 100,000 Naira
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: itel launched the itel A90 smartphone, highlighting its affordability, durability, and smart features. The phone combines aesthetics with performance, making it accessible for under 100,000 Naira.

articles.title: Olipop is teaming up with Crocs to welcome back this fanfavorite flavor at its first soda drive-thru
articles.author: Lily McDonald
articles.summary: Olipop is launching its first soda drive-thru in Los Angeles on May 12, offering unique, internet-inspired drinks and limited-edition mocktails, with the first drink free. The menu includes experimental flavors like Cereal Milk Soda and Dirty Protein Soda, the latter featuring Koia's vanilla bean protein.

articles.title: Jay Peters Yelp will let restaurants use AI to take calls. Companies that offer services will be able to use the AI-powered answering service, too. Yelp will 'soon begin testing' the product, according to the description of its video about the tool.
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Yelp will soon begin testing an AI-powered answering service. This service is intended for companies that offer services.

articles.title: Pioneering AI-Driven Product Innovation Done By Yaswanth Jeganathan
articles.summary: Yaswanth Jeganathan led the go-to-market strategy for a generative AI product, achieving increased sales conversions. He also contributed to growing a SaaS API product to over $100 million in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR). His approach involves collaboration, data-driven decision-making, and a focus on meeting customer needs and pain points.

articles.title: itel A90: The only colorful, durable smartphone you can get for under N100,000
articles.author: Daily Post Staff
articles.summary: itel has launched the itel A90 smartphone in Nigeria, priced under 105,000 Naira. The itel A90 features IP54 dust and water resistance, up to 256GB storage with 12GB extended RAM, a 6.6-inch display, and a 5000mAh battery with 15W fast charging. MTN users who purchase the A90 receive a 50% data bonus for six months.

articles.title: Cracking £25 Samsung deal on S24 offers free Galaxy Watch worth £289 'while stocks last'
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Mobiles.co.uk offers Samsung Galaxy S24 with iD Mobile's 100GB plan for £24.99/month and a free Galaxy Watch 7. They also have a deal on the Samsung Galaxy S25 with Galaxy Buds3 Pro. Carphone Warehouse provides a 24-month deal for the iPhone 16 with unlimited data and free Beats Solo Buds.

articles.title: Verizon's free summer STEM program for middle school students open for registration
articles.author: Brandpoint
org: National Association for Community College Entrepreneurship
J. Orin Edson Entrepreneurship + Innovation Institute
articles.summary: Verizon, in partnership with NACCE and Arizona State University, offers the Verizon Innovative Learning STEM Achievers program. This program, held on college campuses, provides middle school students with free, hands-on STEM education, including technologies like augmented reality, 3D printing, and AI. The program aims to equip 10 million youth with digital skills training by 2030.

articles.title: 'Best tan ever' - Beauty fans say gradual lotion leaves skin glowing naturally
articles.author: Anita McSorley
articles.summary: Bondi Sands Everyday Gradual Tanning Milk is available on the newly launched Amazon Ireland website for €11.71. Vita Liberata Untinted Fabulous Gradual Tanning Lotion (200ml) is on offer at Lookfantastic for €18.95 after a 20% discount using the code 'FLASH'.

articles.title: Yelp will use AI to help restaurants answer calls and make phone reservations
articles.author: Sarah Fielding
articles.summary: Yelp has announced new AI-powered call answering features for restaurants and services as part of its Spring Product Release. This service aims to ensure businesses never miss a call. The company intends to harness AI to improve trust and decision-making for users.

articles.title: OpenAI adds shopping features to ChatGPT Search
articles.author: Steve Dent
articles.summary: OpenAI announced that all ChatGPT users can now shop from ChatGPT Search. The feature allows users to search for products, compare options, and make purchases. Categories like fashion, beauty, home goods and electronics are currently available, with further expansion planned.

articles.title: Your Towels Are Ruining Your Laundry
articles.author: Jeffrey A. Tucker
articles.summary: The article suggests switching from traditional terry-cloth towels to linen towels for improved hygiene and laundry efficiency. Linen towels dry quickly, preventing mold and bacteria buildup, and are available for purchase on platforms like Amazon. This switch aims to resolve laundry issues and unpleasant odors.

articles.title: Meet the itel A90: The Only Colorful & Durable Smartphone You Can Get for Under 100,000 Naira.
articles.author: Saheed
articles.summary: itel has launched its new A90 smartphone in Nigeria, priced under 105,000 Naira. The itel A90 features IP54 dust and water resistance, up to 256GB storage, 12GB extended RAM, and a 5000mAh battery with 15W fast charging. MTN users purchasing the A90 will receive a 50% data bonus for six months.

articles.title: Best Gtech deals on vacuums, lawnmowers and more
articles.author: Mollie Davies
articles.summary: Gtech offers discounts on floorcare bundles, including the system cordless vacuum bundle. The Gtech multi platinum cordless handheld vacuum cleaner is on offer, saving customers over £100. The Gtech heatwave patio heater also has £110 slashed off its price.

articles.title: Yelp will use AI to help restaurants answer calls and make phone reservations
articles.summary: Yelp is launching new AI-powered call answering features as part of its Spring Product Release. This service, integrated into Yelp's platform, will help businesses never miss a call by answering general questions, filtering spam, and transferring calls. For restaurants, the AI will manage reservations and waitlists, while for other services, it will gather project details and provide follow-up information.

articles.title: Boots slashes 'luxurious' £30 cream that 'visibly reduces dark spots' to £10
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: NIVEA Cellular Luminous 630 Anti Dark Spot Night Cream 50ml is being offered at a discounted price by Boots as part of their weekly £10 Tuesday sale. The product is marketed to reduce dark spots within four weeks and has received positive customer reviews for its texture and effectiveness in improving skin tone and reducing hyperpigmentation.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy robot lawnmower to transform your garden – and it costs €200
articles.author: Jamie Smith
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland is launching the PARKSIDE Robot Lawn Mower, featuring app control, rechargeable batteries, and a three-year guarantee. Additionally, the Two Burner Gas Barbecue's price has been reduced to €99.99. Both products are available in stores across Ireland.

articles.title: ‘Where the magic happens': How one company is defining the modern marketer
articles.author: Fast Company Executive Board
articles.summary: Chase Auto is leveraging its extensive network of ATMs to offer personalized pre-approved vehicle loan messages to customers, thus introducing a new avenue for customer acquisition. Furthermore, Chase Auto utilizes first-party data, card transactions, and vehicle purchase behavior to build customer personas and tailor marketing campaigns, focusing on enhancing customer experience and increasing car sales for its partners, including Subaru, Aston Martin, Maserati, Rivian, Jaguar Land Rover and McLaren.

articles.title: Olipop is teaming up with Crocs to welcome back this fanfavorite flavor at its first soda drive-thru
articles.author: Lily McDonald
articles.summary: Olipop is launching its first soda drive-thru in Los Angeles on May 12, featuring unique mocktails like Spicy Pickle Soda and Cereal Milk Soda.  The event also marks the permanent return of Olipop's orange cream flavor, and collaboration with Crocs for limited-edition merchandise, promoting new beverages and related items.

articles.title: Aldi is selling a skincare gadget for £40 less than a similar Boots buy – it clears out your pores instantly
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Aldi introduced the Pore Vacuum, a skincare gadget priced at £9.99, designed to remove dirt, oil, and impurities from pores with gentle suction. The device features five attachments, adjustable suction modes, and is available for a limited time in Aldi stores. Furthermore, Aldi offers several beauty dupes such as Lacura Healthy Glow Exfoliating Tonic and Lacura Caviar Illumination Day Cream.

articles.title: Jam Monster E-Liquid: A Flavor-Packed Journey Into Fruity Goodness
articles.summary: Jam Monster E-Liquid offers a variety of breakfast-inspired vape juice flavors that combine jam, buttery toast, and a hint of warmth. The product line includes flavors such as Apple, Apricot, Banana, Black Cherry, Blackberry, Blueberry, Grape, Grape Jam + Peanut Butter, Lemon and Mixed Berry, each aiming to replicate a gourmet jam-on-toast experience.

articles.title: CDI Products Achieves NADCAP Certification, Joins Michelin at Paris Air Show, Strengthening Commitment to Aerospace
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: CDI Products achieved NADCAP certification. This certification enhances CDI Products' commitment to quality in Aerospace and Defense.

articles.title: OpenAI adds shopping features to ChatGPT Search
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched shopping capabilities within ChatGPT, allowing all users to search for, compare, and buy products. The company has also introduced search functionality in WhatsApp, enabling users to get up-to-date answers via messages to ChatGPT. These updates are available in ChatGPT Plus, Pro, Free, and logged-out users.

articles.title: SugarDaddy.com Reviews [2025] Best Sugar Daddy Website Or A Scam?
articles.author: Sugar Daddy
articles.summary: SugarDaddy.com is a premier online platform designed to connect affluent individuals with attractive partners. The platform's 2025 review highlights dedication to openness and security and provides a first-rate matchmaking experience, it offers premium memberships that unlock additional functionalities. Users can create profiles, add photos, write a brief bio, and define what they seek.

articles.title: Nueva Network Builds Latino Media Presence with Nueva.News
articles.author: Cameron Coats
articles.summary: Nueva Network has launched Nueva.News, a digital news platform tailored to US Latino audiences, covering various topics in Spanish. This launch follows the recent debut of Que Onnda, expanding the network's digital media presence by integrating audio platforms like radio, podcasts, and social media.

articles.title: Salt Security Launches the First MCP Server to Revolutionize API Security in the Age of AI
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Salt Security introduced a new service that empowers enterprises to interact with their APIs using natural language. This provides real-time insights, posture gap analysis, and AI-driven remediation guidance.

articles.title: Swap Launches The Nest, A Community Curated for Brands to Connect, Develop, and Grow
articles.summary: Swap introduces 'The Nest,' a community platform designed for e-commerce brand leaders to connect and collaborate. This new service aims to provide a space for genuine networking and development within the e-commerce industry and it offers members space to exchange insights, collaborate on industry challenges, and discover new opportunities.

articles.title: Authentic flavor, simple ingredients – made without added whiteners, taste the difference with Galbani Fresh Mozzarella
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: Galbani introduces Galbani Fresh Mozzarella, a cow's milk fresh mozzarella made with simple ingredients and traditional Italian craftsmanship. This cheese is made in the USA with rBST-free milk and features a luscious, milky flavor and soft texture, is crafted without titanium dioxide, and is suitable for various dietary preferences.

articles.title: These 34 Cleaning Products Are Not Just Great For Spring Cleaning, But Will Be Your Favorites Year-Round
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of newly available cleaning products ranging from household cleaners to specialized tools. These products include the 'Sprayway Glass Cleaner,' 'The Pink Stuff's Sqeezy Sponge,' 'Puracy Laundry Stain Remover,' 'Angry Orange Pet Odor Eliminator,' 'Diamond Dazzle Stik' and 'iRobot's Roomba Robot Vacuum'. The article features a mix of traditional and innovative solutions aimed at simplifying cleaning tasks and improving overall hygiene.

articles.title: Dyson's ‘most powerful' cordless stick vacuum is on sale at Target right now
articles.author: Rachel Sandstrom Morrison
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a discount on its Gen5detect cordless stick vacuum, reducing the price to $799.99 from $949.99 at Target. The Gen5detect is Dyson's most powerful HEPA cordless vacuum, featuring increased suction power, smart features like an LCD screen, and a Fluffy Optic™ cleaner head.

articles.title: PURPLE TRANSFORMS LUXURY SLEEP WITH NEW REJUVENATE COLLECTION FEATURING GRID TECHNOLOGY - THE MOST COMFORTABLE MATTRESS OF ALL TIME
articles.author: Purple
articles.summary: Purple Innovation has launched its new Rejuvenate Mattress Collection featuring new DreamLayer™ Technology. This line provides pressure relief and support through layered grid technology, outperforming conventional foam or hybrid designs.

articles.title: Innovative Eyewear launches Reebok Smart Eyewear
articles.author: Dean Takahashi
articles.summary: Innovative Eyewear has launched Reebok Smart Eyewear worldwide on Lucyd.co, with expanded availability expected later this quarter on Reebok.com and select retailers. These smart glasses feature custom high-fidelity speakers and amplifiers tuned for outdoor activities, designed to enhance athletic performance and safety.

articles.title: Nokia slashes prices on feature phones — good news for Pakistani consumers
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Nokia HMD announced a significant price drop on its popular feature phone models in Pakistan, including the Nokia 105 Classic, Nokia 106 (2023), Nokia 108 (2024), Nokia 110 (2023), and Nokia 125 (2024). This move aims to make mobile communication more accessible, while also reinforcing the company's commitment to the Pakistani market and potentially reclaiming market share.

articles.title: 'Easy to use' Amazon carpet cleaner that's 'better than professionals' now £108 less
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: The Vax SpinScrub Power Plus Carpet Cleaner is available on Amazon with a significant price reduction. BISSELL SpotClean ProHeat Carpet Cleaner is also on sale on Amazon for a limited time, and the Shark CarpetXpert HairPro Pet Corded Carpet Cleaner is available for the lowest price on Argos. These carpet cleaners offer features like rotating brushes, HeatBlast technology, and anti-tangle technology for effective and convenient carpet cleaning.

articles.title: Novotel Vijayawada Varun Unveils Pelli Sandadi 2.0
articles.author: Neel Achary
articles.summary: Novotel Vijayawada Varun has launched Pelli Sandadi 2.0, a luxury wedding package priced at ₹5,55,000. This all-inclusive package offers bespoke décor, gourmet cuisine, curated entertainment, and event orchestration, aiming to provide a stress-free wedding experience for modern couples.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro India launch confirmed: Everything we know so far
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Edge 60 Pro in India on April 30, 2025. The smartphone features a 6.7-inch 1.5K OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme processor, a triple camera setup with a 50MP main sensor, and a 6000mAh battery with 90W fast charging. It is expected to be priced around Rs. 32000.

articles.title: Centric PLM for Food & Beverage and Grocery Tackle Tariffs Head-On
articles.author: Centric Software
articles.summary: Centric PLM helps food & beverage and grocery companies develop new products and adapt to market changes by providing real-time data access and facilitating agile product development. The PLM solution enables companies to revamp their offerings based on consumer demands and benefits from AI functionalities like least cost formulation to protect margins.

articles.title: Best expandable garden hose? Why the Flexi Hose is worth buying now
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Flexi Hose, an expandable garden hose, is currently on sale on Amazon. The 50ft version is priced at £13.59, and discounts are also available for the 75ft and 100ft versions. The Flexi Hose is known for its durability due to better materials, including brass fixtures.

articles.title: AI-Enhanced Funnels: How Automation Drives Higher Conversion
articles.author: E247
articles.summary: involve.me offers users a no-code platform to build AI-powered, multi-step funnels. The service provides ready-to-use templates for product finders, quote calculators, and personalized onboarding flows, enabling businesses to convert visitors into qualified leads on autopilot.

articles.title: Nubia launches Z70S Ultra smartphone, Pad Pro tablet in China
articles.summary: Nubia has launched the Z70S Ultra smartphone and the Pad Pro tablet in China. The global release of the Z70S Ultra is planned for May 13, followed by the nubia Pad Pro.

articles.title: Amazon's Beauty Event features up to 35% off skincare: Sunday Riley, more
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting its Summer Beauty Event featuring discounts on skincare products from brands like Sunday Riley and Estée Lauder. The event includes deals on products like Sunday Riley C.E.O. Glow Vitamin C + Turmeric Face Oil, Olay Super Serum, and EltaMD UV Sheer Broad-Spectrum SPF 50+ among other skincare and beauty products from various brands.

articles.title: ChatGPT gets smart shopping features, can now guide you to make right purchase
articles.author: Ayushmann Chawla
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new feature for its ChatGPT search tool, designed to enhance online shopping by integrating images, reviews, and direct purchase links. The update, available to GPT-4o users, allows users to search for products using natural language and receive curated recommendations with visuals, ratings, and retailer links. This enhancement underscores OpenAI's ambition to rival Google in the product search space.

articles.title: How to Leverage Telegram Mini Apps for Business Growth with Telega.io: A Professional Guide
articles.author: Business Correspondent
articles.summary: Telega.io introduces advertising services for Telegram Mini Apps, offering businesses a new channel to reach customers. The platform uses a CPM model for cost-effective advertising, quick setup, and centralized campaign management. It allows advertisers to create, launch, and monitor campaigns with real-time analytics.

articles.title: This mechanical keyboard won't fill your backpack
articles.author: Séamus Bellamy
articles.summary: Royal Kludge launched the F68 Foldable Low Profile Mechanical Keyboard. It features a unique folding design, reinforced aluminum body, backlit keys with low-profile brown switches, Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, and USB-C charging. The keyboard can be paired with up to three devices and also offers a wired connection option.

articles.title: 36 Dresses From Amazon For Anyone Looking For A One-And-Done Ensemble
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: The article showcases a diverse collection of dresses and rompers, highlighting their features, prices, and customer reviews. These items are available for purchase, and the article serves as an introduction to these new clothing options, including mini dresses, maxi dresses, and more.

articles.title: Denodo Platform 9.2 Delivers Intuitive Data Marketplace Experience Supported by Advanced Generative AI (GenAI) Capabilities
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Denodo launched Denodo Platform 9.2, adding new features to Denodo Platform 9.1. The update builds on the Denodo Platform's semantic layer and logical data management capabilities, including a full-featured data marketplace, extended GenAI support, and a new suite of self-service tools for data product development.

articles.title: Apr 29, 2025 at 7:00 AM EDT
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Yelp is launching an AI-powered photo recognition feature within its AI assistant. This new service aims to connect users with local service professionals by analyzing photos of their needs, such as broken appliances.

articles.title: Yelp Introduces New AI-powered Features to Streamline Hiring Service Pros and Enhance the Dining Experience
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Yelp Inc. has announced its Spring Product Release, introducing 15 new features and updates. The updates include AI-powered photo recognition in Yelp Assistant, response quality badges utilizing large language models, and new tools for Yelp Guest Manager with features like Guest Experience Surveys and a redesigned party management interface.

articles.title: We checked out the Russell Hobbs Fresh Air Mini Dehumidifier and were super-impressed by its power
articles.author: Senior Journalist
articles.summary: Russell Hobbs introduced the Fresh Air Mini Dehumidifier, retailing at £49.99. This compact 600ml dehumidifier is designed for smaller rooms (up to 15m2) to reduce humidity and condensation. It features a sleek design, LED lighting, a low noise motor, and a defrost function, and is available in black and grey.

articles.title: How to create your own AI action figure with ChatGPT – have you tried this trend?
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: ChatGPT offers a new service that allows users to create AI action figures of themselves. Users can upload photos to ChatGPT and, by following specific prompts, generate images of themselves as personalized AI dolls within blister packs, incorporating their favorite personal items. This trend enables social media users to transform their images into digital action figures using AI.

articles.title: Best mop bucket
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Rubbermaid Commercial WaveBreak Bucket/Wringer Combo features caster wheels and high capacity. O-Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop and Bucket System provides a foot pedal for wringing. Carlisle Commercial Mop Bucket with Side Press Wringer offers a smaller size for easy storage at a commercial grade.

articles.title: TP launches first innovation centre in Middle East to drive AI-powered digital transformation in the region
articles.author: DXB
articles.summary: TP has launched its first innovation center in the Middle East, located in Dubai Internet City. The TP Innovation Centre will support regional ambitions in talent development, innovation-led growth, and digital competitiveness by offering immersive experiences, design thinking labs, and client workshops. It aims to become a global hub for AI solutions and knowledge export with features like a dynamic 3D screen and interactive platforms.

articles.title: Hoover's 'absolutely brilliant' cordless vacuum is cheaper than Amazon and Shark with 56% off
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Hoover has launched the HF9 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner With Anti Hair Wrap, now available for £109 with the discount code POWERFUL. The vacuum features Anti-Twist technology, adjustable brush bar, Turbo Boost, and a 30-minute run time, rivalling Shark and Dyson models. It also has LED lights, a 'Park and Go' feature, and a five-year warranty.

articles.title: Cleaning fans rave over ‘incredible' M&S buy that instantly removes all stubborn stains – it's £1 & smells amazing too
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer launched stain-removing wipes priced at £1.25. These wipes, ideal for carpets, upholstery, and clothes, have gained popularity on social media for their effectiveness and almond and sweet orange scent. Users have praised the product for its stain-removing capabilities.

articles.title: Meizu Note 16 design confirmed, color options revealed
articles.author: Anvinraj Valiyathara
articles.summary: Meizu is launching the Note 16 series in China in May. The Note 16 will feature a 6.78-inch LCD display, a Unisoc T765 chipset, and a 6,600mAh battery with 40W charging, while the Note 16 Pro may have a smaller battery with 80W charging.

articles.title: I tried ChatGPT's new shopping feature. It's efficient, just not built for picky shoppers like me.
articles.author: Lee Chong Ming
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new shopping feature for ChatGPT that allows users to receive product recommendations, including images, reviews, and direct links to retailers. The feature covers categories like fashion, electronics, and home goods and is designed to provide curated product lists based on user preferences and online reviews. The product listings are not paid placements.

articles.title: Finally, a zipper that zips itself
articles.author: Hunter Schwarz
articles.summary: YKK, a Japanese zipper maker, has developed a prototype for a self-propelled zipper designed for industrial applications. The zipper, activated by a button, uses a motorized screw to zip up materials, potentially saving time and improving safety compared to manual zipping methods. YKK plans to continue developing the prototype for practical use.

articles.title: How a 23-year-old Pakistani entrepreneur is disrupting the $339 million wearable tech market
articles.summary: Zero Lifestyle is introducing wearable technology to the Pakistani market with affordable smartwatches and earbuds, like the Robo Earbuds and Regal Smartwatch, featuring AI-powered capabilities. The company is also planning to launch the Thunder Box, aiming to redefine compact audio, and is partnering with cultural icons to expand its reach in the digital generation.

articles.title: OpenAI rolls out Shopping-GPT, rivals Google, Grok and Perplexity's search experience
articles.author: Our Web Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched 'Shopping-GPT', a new feature within ChatGPT that allows users to shop online through conversational prompts. This feature, available to all ChatGPT users, enables browsing of products across the web, aiming to simplify the process of finding, comparing, and purchasing products with personalized recommendations and direct links to merchants.

articles.title: Alibaba introduces open-source AI model with hybrid reasoning
articles.author: 许嘉怡
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched Qwen3, the latest generation of its open-sourced large language model (LLM) family, which also marks the company's debut of hybrid reasoning models. The Qwen3 series features six dense models and two Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) models, which is open-sourced and available worldwide.

articles.title: China brims with new vitality on journey to high-quality development
articles.author: Zhou Shanshan (
org: China National Heavy Duty Truck Group Co., Ltd.
articles.summary: Haier's innovative triple-drum washer, conceived from netizens' suggestions and realized through green manufacturing, became an instant hit at the fifth China International Consumer Products Expo. Sinotruk's Laiwu facility utilizes flexible automated body welding production lines to complete 38 processes in just 2.5 hours. CATL has developed lithium battery and new energy enterprises, integrating over 80 upstream and downstream companies into a comprehensive industrial supply chain in Ningde.

articles.title: Boots slashes 'luxurious' £30 cream that 'visibly reduces dark spots' to £10
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Nivea's Cellular Luminous 630 Anti Dark Spot Night Cream is highlighted for its ability to reduce dark spots and recharge skin overnight. Boots is offering the Nivea night cream at a reduced price of £10 as part of their weekly promotion. The product description claims visible results in four weeks, with users reporting lighter brown spots and improved skin texture.

articles.title: Alibaba launches Qwen 3 AI model with hybrid reasoning
articles.author: Monitoring Desk
articles.summary: Alibaba Group launched Qwen 3, an upgraded AI model with hybrid reasoning capabilities. Baidu also released Ernie 4.5 Turbo and Ernie X1 Turbo models. Alibaba previously rolled out Qwen 2.5-Max.

articles.title: Giffgaff will give Brits £100 to trial its first-ever broadband for £10 a month
articles.author: Levi Winchester
articles.summary: Giffgaff is launching its first home broadband service, a full fibre service with speeds up to 500Mbps, and is seeking 500 customers to trial it for £10 per month for 12 months with a £100 bonus. This trial phase allows Giffgaff to gather feedback to improve their broadband offering.

articles.title: OpenAI upgrades ChatGPT with personalized shopping recommendations
articles.author: Monitoring Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI announced a significant update to ChatGPT's web search capabilities, enhancing online shopping by offering personalized product recommendations with images, reviews, and direct purchase links. This feature will be integrated into GPT-4o and available globally to all ChatGPT users across various tiers. The product suggestions, covering categories like fashion and electronics, will be determined independently using metadata from third-party sources, without including advertisements or commissions for OpenAI.

articles.title: OpenAI says ChatGPT taking on Google by offering AI searches for products
articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new shopping capability within ChatGPT, enabling users to find and compare products online through natural conversation. This feature, currently focused on fashion, beauty, and home electronics, provides personalized product recommendations sourced directly from the web, not from advertisements. Users can also engage in follow-up questions and product comparisons, connecting them directly to merchants for purchases.

articles.title: OpenAI Unveils ChatGPT Shopping Feature: A Revolutionary Update
articles.author: Itishree Sethy
articles.summary: OpenAI launched an update to ChatGPT, introducing a shopping feature within the app. This new "Search mode" enables users to find, compare, and purchase products from across the web. The rollout is global and available to all tiers of users.

articles.title: Jumia Nigeria Launches ‘Joy Delivered' Campaign
articles.author: Leadership News
articles.summary: Jumia Nigeria launched a new brand campaign, 'Joy Delivered,' to reaffirm its commitment to providing affordable, accessible, and high-quality everyday essentials. As part of the campaign, Jumia is also expanding its services to more cities and towns across Nigeria and showcasing high-demand items at affordable price points.

articles.title: Cerillion unveils breakthrough Promotions Engine and further GenAI innovation in latest BSS/OSS suite update
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cerillion has launched Cerillion 25.1, a new version of its BSS/OSS suite that includes a next-generation Promotions Engine. Cerillion 25.1 also delivers AI-powered intelligent assistants, Bill Intelligence, Sales Assistant and Promotions Assistant, designed to streamline the customer and user experience.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus Review: A smartphone that's different, practical and stylish
articles.author: Haider Ali Khan
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus, a new smartphone featuring a stylus, priced starting at ₹22,999. The device includes a 6.67-inch 1.5K pOLED display, a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, a 50MP main camera, and a 5,000 mAh battery with 68W TurboPower fast charging.

articles.title: This rugged Android is my go-to phone for off-grid adventures - and it's on sale
articles.author: Adrian Kingsley-Hughes
articles.summary: Blackview is launching the BV7300, a ruggedized smartphone featuring a 6.67-inch HD+ IPS display with Corning Gorilla Glass 5, a MediaTek Helio G81 chip, 6GB RAM (expandable to 12GB), 256GB storage (expandable with a 2TB microSD card), and a massive 15,000mAh battery. It includes a powerful 800-lumen flashlight and a night vision camera.

articles.title: I switched to an e-paper Android phone with a physical keyboard - here's my buying advice
articles.author: Kyle Kucharski
articles.summary: Minimal Company is launching the Minimal Phone, an Android device featuring an e-paper display and physical QWERTY keyboard, priced at $399 for pre-order. The phone includes access to the Google Play store and is powered by a MediaTek Helio G99 CPU with up to 8GB of memory and 256GB of storage.

articles.title: Action Bronson Teases New Balance 992 Collaboration
articles.summary: Action Bronson and New Balance are collaborating on a project featuring the 992 sneaker.  The release is expected later this year, though the exact date hasn't been announced.

articles.title: Legend Internet Plc Listing Signals New Era For Nigeria's Digital Economy
articles.author: Kelechukwu Mgboji
articles.summary: Legend Internet Plc listed 2 billion shares on the NGX Main Board, marking the introduction of broadband services as a formal subsector on the Exchange. Founded in 2021, Legend Internet aims to scale broadband access, expand data centers, and roll out digital services.

articles.title: OpenAI updates ChatGPT search with new shopping features: Here's how itworks
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new shopping feature in ChatGPT, enabling users to find products, compare options, view images and reviews, and access direct purchase links within the chatbot. This feature allows for detailed, natural-language queries and tailored product recommendations across categories like fashion, beauty, home goods, and electronics. Future plans include integrating ChatGPT's memory feature for more personalized recommendations for Pro and Plus users.

articles.title: Another Popular Southern Chicken Chain is Coming to New Jersey
articles.author: Sue Moll Sue Moll Published:
articles.summary: Zaxby's, a Georgia-based chicken chain, is opening a new location in Magnolia, NJ, later this year. Zaxby's is known for its signature product, 'Chicken Fingerz,' and offers a variety of chicken fingers, wings, salads, and sandwiches. The company prides itself on providing a unique and joyful customer experience.

articles.title: OpenAI introduces shopping features with ChatGPT Search Update
articles.author: Innovation Village
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched new shopping features within ChatGPT's search capabilities. This update, announced on Monday and available in GPT-4o, aims to create a more personalized online shopping experience for all ChatGPT users across Free, Plus, and Pro tiers.

articles.title: OpenAI turns ChatGPT into shopping assistant with new commerce features
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI launched new shopping capabilities within ChatGPT, allowing users to find, compare, and purchase products more easily. This update includes enhanced product results with pricing, reviews, and direct purchase links, available to Plus, Pro, Free, and logged-out users. The company also improved ChatGPT's search functionality, including WhatsApp integration and trending search suggestions.

articles.title: Casamaa Professional Ionic Hair Dryer better than half price at Amazon
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Casamaa launched the Casamaa Professional Ionic Hair Dryer, available on Amazon for £29.99. The hairdryer features a high-speed AC motor, ionic technology, constant temperature control, and attachments for different styles. It offers a more affordable alternative to the Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer.

articles.title: This Dyson inspired hairdryer is now better than half price at Amazon
articles.author: Natalie Dixon
articles.summary: Casamaa has introduced the Casamaa Professional Ionic Hair Dryer, available on Amazon for £29.99. The hairdryer features a durable AC motor and ionic technology for rapid drying and a smooth, shiny finish, including concentrator and diffuser attachments. It also boasts features such as constant temperature control, multiple speed and heat settings, and built-in safety measures.

articles.title: Casamaa Professional Ionic Hair Dryer better than half price at Amazon
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Casamaa has launched the Professional Ionic Hair Dryer, available on Amazon for £29.99. This hairdryer features a high-speed AC motor, ionic technology, temperature control, and multiple attachments for various hair styles. The product aims to provide professional-grade performance at an affordable price, offering a fast, powerful, and safe hair drying solution with a focus on minimizing heat damage and maximizing moisture retention.

articles.title: ChatGPT gets a shopping update: Why it's a major challenge to Google
articles.author: Soumyarendra Barik
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new shopping feature on ChatGPT, allowing users to find and purchase products based on their queries. ChatGPT displays product options in carousels, providing details and links to purchase websites. This feature is available to Plus, Pro, Free, and logged-out users and uses information from third-party providers, with future plans to allow merchants to directly provide product feeds.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion: A few thoughtful features make it stand out
articles.author: Sahil Bhalla
articles.summary: Motorola has recently launched the Motorola Edge 60 Fusion, with the Motorola Edge 60 Pro set to launch soon. The Edge 60 Fusion starts at ₹ 22,999 and features an improved OLED display, larger battery, increased storage, and a refreshed chipset.

articles.title: Shanghai Adult Expo: Hugging Robots, Talking Dolls, Toys That Learn
articles.author: Sixth Tone
articles.summary: Chunshuitang introduced a humanoid robot integrated with AI platforms like DeepSeek and Baidu's Wenxiaoyan, offering customized services. Magic Motion launched an upgraded smart vibrator with squeeze-sensing vibration and Kegel training, initially targeting postpartum women but now appealing to a younger market.

articles.title: Users Can Now Buy Products In ChatGPT; OpenAI Rolls Out Improvements To ChatGPT Search, Shopping
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a product purchase feature on ChatGPT for Plus, Pro, Free, and logged-out users. This new feature enables users to search for a product, compare options, and buy products within ChatGPT. The AI independently selects products based on user intent, displaying relevant options in visual carousels with pricing and reviews, providing direct links to purchase.

articles.title: Innodisk Unveils Game-Changing PCIe Gen5 SSD Series for Future Data Centers
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Innodisk has unveiled its new PCIe Gen5 SSD series designed for AI model training and big data analytics. The SSDs support multiple form factors and offer speeds of 14GB/s read and 10GB/s write. Availability is scheduled for Q2 2025.

articles.title: OpenAI goes after Google's golden egg with product marketing on ChatGPT
articles.author: Shouvik Das
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched the ChatGPT search engine integrated with WhatsApp, challenging Google's search advertising model. Furthermore, OpenAI is introducing personalized product recommendations within the ChatGPT application. These developments mark OpenAI's expansion into search and product recommendation services.

articles.title: OpenAI New Features, Improvements: ChatGPT Shopping, Improved Citations, Trending and Autocomplete and Search in WhatsApp Rolled Out for Pro, Plus and Free Users
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: OpenAI announced improvements to ChatGPT, focusing on a better shopping experience, allowing users to search, compare options, and buy products. Additionally, ChatGPT now integrates with WhatsApp, enabling users to receive answers and use the chatbot through WhatsApp.

articles.title: 38 Revolutionary Products That Will Rocket You Into The Future
articles.author: Buzz Feed Staff
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products and gadgets available on Amazon.  Some of these products include the Medicube Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer with liposome capsules for brightening and smoothing skin, E.l.f Lash Xtndr mascara utilizing tubing technology for lash enhancement, and Munbyn thermal printer for creating custom stickers and shipping labels.

articles.title: OpenAI announces that it will start showing product recommendations in ChatGPT, even for logged-out users, with buy buttons that link to merchants' sites (Reece Rogers/Wired)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching a shopping experience within ChatGPT. This new feature includes product recommendations, even for logged-out users, and buy buttons that link directly to merchant sites.

articles.title: The most reliable new Lexus models, ranked
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Lexus is preparing to release a new Lexus ES model.

articles.title: ChatGPT steps into online shopping, turning up heat on Google
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new shopping capability within ChatGPT, allowing users to find and compare products through natural conversation and direct connections to merchants. This feature, initially focused on fashion, beauty, and home electronics, aims to provide personalized product recommendations sourced from the web, rather than advertisements, and is designed to compete with Google's search engine.

articles.title: Velou: Decoding the future of ecommerce
articles.summary: Velou introduces an AI-powered solution aimed at revolutionizing e-commerce by enhancing product data and improving online retailers' visibility. The company's ProductCatalogAgent is designed as a virtual assistant that identifies errors, fills in missing details, and ensures up-to-date product listings across platforms, reducing manual effort.

articles.title: 29 Genuinely Cool TikTok-Approved Things You Won't Forget About 5 Seconds After You Scroll By
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of newly introduced or trending products across various categories, available on Amazon, from beauty items like E.l.f's Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara and Catrice 'Instant Awake' Under Eye Brightener to household items like the Magic Mushroom funnel. It also features food products, such as Nuts 'N More's Chocolate Maple Pretzel Peanut Butter Spread and Bachan's Japanese Barbecue Sauce, showcasing small businesses and unique offerings.

articles.title: Smart Mowing Prevails: Segway Navimow's Revolutionary Robot Mower Arrives at Lowe's
articles.author: Segway Navimow
articles.summary: Segway Navimow, a robotic lawn care company, has announced that its wire-free robotic mowers, including the H Series and i Series, are now available for purchase at Lowe's online stores.

articles.title: Alibaba Introduces Qwen3, Setting New Benchmark in Open-Source AI with Hybrid Reasoning
articles.author: Vietnam News
articles.summary: Alibaba has launched Qwen3, the company's latest generation open-sourced large language model. This launch sets a new benchmark in open-source AI with hybrid reasoning capabilities.

articles.title: 32 Home Products That Do A Whole Lot Of Work For You For Very Little Money
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article showcases numerous new or recently trending cleaning and home products.  These products, ranging from laundry stain removers by Puracy and Pink Stuff cleaning solutions to specialized cleaners like Keurig cleaner pods and dishwasher tablets, are presented as solutions for everyday cleaning challenges.  Small businesses like Fullstar (kitchen gadgets), Powerstone Pumice (home cleaning products) and Stasher (storage bags) are also featured with products like a veggie chopper, pumice stone and reusable storage bags.

articles.title: Alibaba unveils advanced Qwen 3 AI as Chinese tech rivalry intensifies
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Alibaba Group launched Qwen 3, an upgraded AI model with new hybrid reasoning capabilities. Baidu released its Ernie 4.5 Turbo and reasoning-focused Ernie X1 Turbo models. Alibaba's Qwen 3 merges AI functions with dynamic reasoning, providing a platform for app and software developers.

articles.title: Legend Internet Plc Debuts on NGX, Adds N11.28bn to Market Capitalisation, Fuels Nigeria's Broadband Revolution 'Latest Naira Dollar Rate News – Naija247news'
articles.author: Bisi Adele
articles.summary: Legend Internet Plc, a Nigerian broadband provider, listed 2 billion ordinary shares on the Nigerian Exchange Limited (NGX). The listing, which involves offering already existing shares to the public, aims to support the company's growth and contribute to Nigeria's digital economy by increasing investor interest in tech infrastructure plays. The company is committed to becoming Africa's most customer-focused internet company and aims to expand its broadband services.

articles.title: 5 Best Bulk Texting Services That Feel Like Having a Marketing Superpower!
articles.author: Judhajeet Das
articles.summary: The article introduces five SMS marketing platforms: JookSMS, EZ Texting, Text Marks, Trumpia, and Red Oxygen. Each platform offers unique features and caters to different business needs, from unlimited texting with JookSMS to AI-powered automation with Trumpia. The article details ideal use cases and pricing for each product.

articles.title: OpenAI Adds New Features to ChatGPT Search, Including Shopping Tools
articles.summary: OpenAI has updated ChatGPT's search tool with new shopping features. The updated tool enables users to find products, compare prices from multiple websites, and receive helpful information while chatting, with the aim of making smarter choices and saving time.

articles.title: How to Make an AI Chatbot?
articles.summary: Belitsoft, a custom software development company, offers AI chatbot consulting, development, and API integration services. They assist startups and large enterprises in developing custom AI assistants with advanced functionality, capable of handling complex scenarios and achieving business goals. The company also provides chatbot design and architecture services, applying UI/UX design, conversational AI, and ML technologies.

articles.title: Authentic flavor, simple ingredients – made without added whiteners, taste the difference with Galbani Fresh Mozzarella
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: Galbani, Italy's #1 cheese brand, offers Fresh Mozzarella made without added whiteners like titanium dioxide. This cow's milk fresh mozzarella delivers a luscious, milky flavor and soft texture, bringing an authentic Italian experience to American kitchens.

articles.title: BYD to bring two more plug-in hybrid models to Germany this year
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: BYD plans to launch two additional plug-in hybrid models in Germany this year. This move aims to meet diverse consumer needs in the German market.

articles.summary: TP has launched its first innovation center in the Middle East, located in Dubai Internet City. This innovation center is intended to serve as a strategic partner to businesses and drive their AI-powered digital transformation.

articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: New fragrance, skincare, and SPF products are being launched in the beauty market. These introductions cater to demands for next-generation skincare and sun protection solutions.

articles.summary: vivo launched the V50 Lite smartphone. This launch aims to empower creators, storytellers, and everyday users.

articles.summary: Sonic is introducing the Unicorn Dreams Slush, a new product featuring flavor bubbles and color-changing straws. This represents a new offering from Sonic in the beverage category.

articles.title: Why AI-Powered Hyper-Personalization Is A Must For All Businesses
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: Starbucks utilizes Deep Brew, their proprietary AI platform, to analyze customer data. This analysis enables Starbucks to offer personalized marketing messages and menu recommendations, leading to increased engagement and a larger rewards program.

articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Bandai Namco and FromSoftware, in partnership with Torch Torch, announced new Elden Ring merchandise. This represents the launch of a new product related to the Elden Ring franchise.

articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: A British food brand has launched its first potato product, roast potatoes, which has left shoppers baffled. The product is based on a spread that has been divisive for over a century.

articles.title: Reduce your operational overhead today with Amazon CloudFront SaaS Manager (Amazoncom Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Amazon CloudFront announced the general availability of Amazon CloudFront SaaS Manager. This new feature assists software-as-a-service (SaaS) providers, web development platform providers, and companies manage delivery across multiple domains. Customers were already using CloudFront for this purpose.

articles.title: ChatGPT Adds Shopping Help, Intensifying Google Rivalry
articles.author: NDTV

articles.summary: OpenAI introduced shopping features to ChatGPT Search on Thursday. This new feature enables users to find and buy products by redirecting them from the ChatGPT interface to merchant websites. The update is available to all users.

articles.title: Beauty Launches And Happenings, Including Women's Fragrances By Gant
articles.author: Felicity Carter
articles.summary: Gant launched its debut women's fragrances, Gant Preppy Rose and Gant Sunset Club. Molton Brown debuted the Bluebell & Wild Strawberry collection, while Charlotte Tilbury launched a gaming collaboration with Genshin Impact, introducing limited-edition beauty boxes. Dyson released the Airstrait Straightener in Ceramic Pink using airflow technology. In addition, the article details product launches from other companies like Aesop, Typebea, Neal's Yard, Fenty Beauty, Elemis, Davines, Milk Makeup, Espa, This Works, TRESemmé, and La Roche-Posay.
